QuestData.Title: Who's a Big Troll?
QuestData.Description: <The skull speaks once more.>$b$bMy soul is ready, but my body is not. The Bloodscalps desecrated my old body long ago. The horrors that they inflicted upon me... my spirit watched on while they tore my body apart and, and... I can't go on.$b$bTheir chief, Gan'zulah, presided over the gruesome acts. In fact, if memory serves, he was a strong, powerful troll... about the same size as I was. What a fine coincidence.$b$bYou know what to do, $r. Make it quick.
QuestData.RewardText: You have done well, $r. Only one more step remains before I may return.
